Articles.Content: hey all I'm a long time lurker I've been playing KSP for close to 400 hours so I figured it was time for me to start posting on the forums about my thoughts and ideas

Welcome, lurker. Come in from the cold.

We spend a lot of time sharing thoughts and ideas here. As well as pictures, spacecraft, videos...

Good to have you aboard.

Happy landings!

Warmer in here, huh?

Welcome aboard!

Too bad my name doesn't start with star. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

Welcome! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Eh, niether does mine.

Welcome aboard, Kiros!

welcome kiros!

> 
> Too bad my name doesn't start with star. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
> Welcome! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

You're a star to us regardless!

> You're a star to us regardless!

Aww, thanks! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
Gidday and welcome Kiros. I'm also from the land of Oz and new to the forum, but unlike you I'm also new to KSP. Now it's just a matter of finding the time to fly to the moon and beyond!
